title: Super Remix Best
original_name: 僕とお昼を スーパーリミックスベ 2; 稲作 スーパーリミックスベスト 1; 行け！稲中卓球部; 僕といっしょ
sinopse:
In the Super Remix Best series:

Volume 1) Inasaku (稲作) Super Remix Best 1

1. One-shot episode "Boku no Kenkou (My Health)--
   When I pooped one morning...I gave birth to a rabbit.
2. Unpublished prologue of "Ike! Inachuu Takyuubu"
3. Remix (recap) of "Ike! Inachuu Takyuubu" series

Volume 2) Boku to Ohiru wo (僕とお昼を) Super Remix Best 2

1. One-shot "Itsuka Ore datte (Someday I can)"
2. One-shot "Futari de Dekirukoto (Something we two can do)"
3. Remix (recap) of "Boku to Issho" series
4. Remix (recap) of "Green Hill" series
